en: Oh clap your hands, all ye peoples; Shout unto God with the voice of triumph.
hmr: Aw mi tinrênghai, in kut ben unla, Hlimna râwlin Pathien kuomah khêk ro.

en: For Jehovah Most High is terrible; He is a great King over all the earth.
hmr: LALPA Achunghnungtak chu ṭi a um sih a. Hnuoi chung po poah Lal ropuitak a nih.

en: He subdueth peoples under us, And nations under our feet.
hmr: Ama chun mi tin chu ei hnuoiah tukdawl a ta, Hnam tin chu ei ke hnuoiah tukdawl bawk a tih.

en: He chooseth our inheritance for us, The glory of Jacob whom he loved. [Selah
hmr: Ama chun ei rohluo ding chu mi thlangpêk a ta, A hmangai Jakob sawngtak ram chu.

en: God is gone up with a shout, Jehovah with the sound of a trumpet.
hmr: Pathien chu khêkri leh a hang feh a, LALPA chu tawtawrâwt ri leh a hang fe tah.

en: Sing praises to God, sing praises: Sing praises unto our King, sing praises.
hmr: Pathien inpâkin hla sak unla, inpâkin sak ro, Ei Laltak inpâkna hla sak unla, inpâkin sak ro.

en: For God is the King of all the earth: Sing ye praises with understanding.
hmr: Pathien chu khawvêl po po Lal a ni sih a, Hrethiema inpâkin hla sak ro.

en: God reigneth over the nations: God sitteth upon his holy throne.
hmr: Pathien chu hnam tin chungah Lalah a ṭhung a, Pathien chu lalṭhungpha inthienga chun a ṭhung a,

en: The princes of the peoples are gathered together To be the people of the God of Abraham; For the shields of the earth belong unto God: He is greatly exalted.
hmr: Mi tin laia milienhai chu an um khâwm a, Abraham Pathien mihai ni dingin; Leihnuoi phawhai chu Pathien ta a ni sih a, Ama chu nasataka chawimawiin a um a nih.
